name: Aer Click Car Fragrance Gel Musk
description: In addition to ensuring that your car is fragrant whenever you want it to be, the Godrej Aer Click air freshener also allows you to manage fragrance intensity by turning it on and off and adjusting the amount of fragrance released. Utilizing clever gel technology, upto 60 days of fragrance retention are provided by Godrej aer Click which is totally spill-proof. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
